bilingual.source: And who will be the gold cup champion?
I, Jack, will be the next area champion.
bilingual.target: 我，杰克，将成为下一个地区冠军。

bilingual.source: Sultan's dream is to become a champion falconer in the Gold Ring competition.
bilingual.target: 苏丹的梦想是在金环比赛中成为冠军猎鹰者。

bilingual.source: Who is the champion of this season?
He is the champion of this competition.
She dreams of becoming a world champion.

bilingual.target: 这场决赛将决定冠军归属。

bilingual.source: She is the curr champion of the tournament.
bilingual.target: 她是当前的锦标赛冠军。
冠军的记录依然无人质疑。

list.abstract: Champion（冠军）是一个美国运动服饰品牌。 1919年，Simon Feinbloom和他的父亲一起，在美国纽约的罗切斯特正式成立了Champion KnitWear Co.。 2024年2月，据《女装日报》报道，Champion正被挂牌出售，首轮竞标已于2月21日截止，Champion母公司HanesBrands为其定下的起拍价为14亿美元（约合人民币101亿元）。

Champion
演唱：Matisyahu

yingyinNormal.en: My dad. Yes, Troy. Wildcat basketball champion, class of 1981.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我爸爸。对，特洛伊，野猫队冠军，1981级。

yingyinNormal.en: Everyday Americans need a champion, and I want to be that champion.
yingyinNormal.zh: 每一天，美国都需要一个冠军，而我希望成为那个冠军。

yingyinNormal.en: Champion Daddy Pig. And who is this? I'm Peppa Pig. One day, I will be the champion puddle jumper.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的爸爸是冠军。这又是谁呢。我是小猪佩奇，知道吗，总有一天，我也会成为跳泥坑的冠军呢。

yingyinNormal.en: Champion, father, and now coach. It's a winning tradition like no other.
yingyinNormal.zh: 冠军，父亲，现在是教练，这是与众不同的胜利传统。

yingyinNormal.en: That was amazing. Yes. I was the world champion at ski and won this cup.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这太棒了。是的，我是滑雪世界冠军，我还赢得过奖杯。

yingyinNormal.en: Math club. National Merit finalist. Coney Island Hot Dog Eating Champion.
yingyinNormal.zh: 参加过数学俱乐部，全国英才奖学金决赛候选人，科尼岛上吃热狗比赛冠军。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy Pig, you lost the world record. Everyone wants you to be champion again. It's important.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪爸爸，你的世界记录被打破了。大家都希望你能重新成为冠军。这件事很重要。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, Daddy Pig is champion puddle jumper. No one's beaten me yet. I don't think they ever will.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真的呢，你的爸爸是跳泥坑的冠军呢。哇。还没人能打破我的记录，我想以后也不会有的。

yingyinNormal.en: Everyone knows how to jump in muddy puddles, daddy. But not everyone is a champion, Peppa. Daddy pig is the master.
yingyinNormal.zh: 可是每一个人都知道怎么跳泥坑的爸爸。啊，但不是每一个人都能当冠军的，佩奇。猪爸爸你是跳泥坑的大师。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh. Daddy, you are not the champion anymore. Everyone will be sad. I'm sure they've got more important things to worry about, Peppa.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哦。爸爸，你在也不是世界冠军了。大家都会很伤心的。哦吼，我觉得大家一定有更重要的事要操心，佩奇。

yingyinNormal.en: Mummy, what's a world record? It means you are best in the world at something. Then you are a champion, and your name goes in a book.
yingyinNormal.zh: 妈妈，世界纪录是什么啊。意思就是你在某方面是世界第一。也就是说，你是冠军，你的名字会被记录下来。

yingyinNormal.en: Now all we need is a champion. You're a little taller than I thought you'd be.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们只需要有一位勇士挺身而出了，你比我想象的要高一点。

yingyinNormal.en: Why are you acting so guilty? You're guilty. How did I ever get to be a champion debater?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你怎么一副犯了错的样子？你才犯了错。我是怎么成为优秀辩手的？

yingyinNormal.en: I have a champion. Do you know Fang Zhen of the Red Lotus Society? By reputation. A peasant farmer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我有王牌，你有没有听说过红莲教的方正？略有耳闻，他是个农夫。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, yes, I can. But when a champion steps forth to slay the Jabberwocky, the people will rise against her.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哦，我能想象到，但是，当有位勇士出来杀死了炸脖龙，人们就会起来反对她。

yingyinNormal.en: All right. Very well, Mindy. I'll give him a chance. But when your little champion fails to return, I get to splatter this crab all over the walls.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧。好吧，敏迪，我给他个机会。但是如果你的小家伙回不来，我就把这头蟹烧个唏哩哗啦。

yingyinNormal.en: You're a fool, Donald. You always were. You and your dumb, dead wife that you never, ever shut up about. Principled? Idealistic? A champion for the people?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是个傻瓜，唐纳德，一直都是。你和你三句不离的那个蠢亡妻，有原则，理想主义？捍卫人民？

exam_freq_info.chinese: 支持; 拥护; 拥护者

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 支持; 拥护; 拥护者

examination_example.sentence: He <highlight>championed</highlight> cunning, ruthlessness, and boldness, rather than virtue, mercy and justice, as the skills of successful leaders.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他提倡将狡猾、无情和大胆，而不是美德、仁慈和正义，作为成功领导者的技能。

sense_info_list.en: a person who has defeated or surpassed all rivals in a competition, especially in sports

word_usage.usage: champion作动词时，为及物动词，其后可直接接名词或者代词，如：champion unpopular causes 拥护不得人心的事业。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Champions</highlight> of this type of regenerative grazing also point to its animal welfare, climate and health benefits: Grass-fed animals live longer out of confinement.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种可再生放牧的拥护者还指出了其对动物的福利，气候和健康的好处: 没了限制之后草饲动物会活得更久。

sense_info_list.en: a person who has defeated or surpassed all rivals in a competition, especially in sports

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 锦标赛；强力支持；极力保护；冠军头衔；冠军位置

examination_example.sentence: Isn't this the same crowd that rails against processed junk and <highlight>champions</highlight> craft cooking?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这不是反对加工的垃圾食品和拥护精致烹饪的那群人吗？

sense_info_list.en: a person who has defeated or surpassed all rivals in a competition; especially in sports

examination_example.sentence: Six are awarded, with one <highlight>champion</highlight>, one first runner-up, one second runner-up and three honorable mentions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 奖项共6名，其中冠军1名，亚军1名，季军1名，荣誉奖3名。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Remember, even world <highlight>champion</highlight> athletes practice their skills on a consistent basis.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 请记住，即使是世界冠军运动员也要坚持不懈地练习技巧。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 锦标赛；强力支持；极力保护；冠军头衔；冠军位置

word_family.mean: n. 冠军；斗士；提倡者；捍卫者；骑士

examination_example.sentence: As long as he tries his best, it doesn’t matter whether he’ll be a <highlight>champion</highlight> or not.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只要他尽力而为，他是否会成为冠军并不重要。

examination_example.sentence: Do you think Yi Xiaoyang should stick to the dream of becoming an Olympic <highlight>champion</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你认为易晓阳应该坚持成为奥运冠军的梦想吗？

examination_example.sentence: I might have dreamed of becoming an Olympic <highlight>champion</highlight> (冠军) before, but now it comes much clearer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我以前可能梦想成为一名奥运冠军，但现在我的梦想变得清晰多了。
